item.title: 阿拉巴马州民主党人玛丽莲-兰兹（Marilyn Lands）在阿拉巴马州第 10 区州众议院席位的竞选中宣传试管婴儿和堕胎权利，希望能在周二的特别选举中取得成功。
item.description:
Alabama Democrat Marilyn Lands is campaigning on IVF and abortion rights in a race for Alabama's District 10's state House seat, hoping it pays off in Tuesday's special election. https://t.co/JoJ65NbqXf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 曾在核导弹发射场工作、被称为 "导弹兵 "的前空军成员对其群体中癌症病例的增加感到担忧。

item.title: 最高法院听取了对美国食品药品管理局（FDA）管制米非司酮的质疑，米非司酮是一种广泛用于药物流产的药物。以下是大约两个小时的辩论中的五大要点：
item.description:
The Supreme Court heard a challenge to the FDA's regulation of mifepristone, a widely used drug used in medication abortions.

Here are five key takeaways from the roughly two hours of arguments: https://t.co/u2kJoonWkV

item.title: 在关于限制堕胎药米非司酮的辩论中，人们引用了一项有 151 年历史的法律，即 1873 年的《康斯托克法案》，根据该法案，利用运输工具邮寄 "淫秽 "材料是非法的：
item.description:
Being cited in the debate over restrictions on the abortion pill mifepristone is a 151-year-old law, the Comstock Act of 1873, under which it's illegal to use carriers to mail "obscene" materials.

Here's what to know: https://t.co/Gd2Th0xTGC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在上周的开奖中无人中奖后，"百万大奖 "的头奖奖金已增至 11.2 亿美元。

item.title: 马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）在被问及弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥坍塌时是否有车辆时说："目前仍在进行调查。
item.description:
Asked whether there were vehicles on the Francis Scott Key Bridge when it collapsed, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore says "there is still an investigation going on."

At least six people remain unaccounted for, officials say. https://t.co/qa2QDcz2rZ pic.twitter.com/Pioxdh12CY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）在周二下午的新闻发布会上说，巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥垮塌 14 小时后，工作人员仍在拼命寻找仍下落不明的六人。
item.description:
Fourteen hours after the collapse of Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge, crews are still desperately looking for the six people who remain unaccounted for, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore said at a news conference Tuesday afternoon. https://t.co/zc0OAmUHAg pic.twitter.com/C219t5fKPR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 伊利诺伊州州长普利兹克宣布，假释委员会主席和成员辞职，他们负责监督一名被控刺伤前女友并杀害其子、11 岁的杰登-珀金斯（Jayden Perkins）的男子的假释。
item.description:
Illinois Gov. Pritzker has announced the resignation of the parole board chair and member who oversaw parole for a man accused of stabbing an-ex-girlfriend and killing her son, 11-year-old Jayden Perkins. https://t.co/laGqlE7Z75

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 海岸警卫队官员说，在弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥垮塌现场的紧急搜寻工作仍在继续，仍有六人下落不明。马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）说，坍塌发生时，工人们正在桥上修补坑洞。
item.description:
Six people remain unaccounted for as the desperate search continues at the site of the Francis Scott Key Bridge collapse, Coast Guard officials said. Workers were on the bridge working on potholes at the time of the collapse, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore said. https://t.co/jHtm617UkH pic.twitter.com/FAj5rlpQgi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 挂牌显示，这艘悬挂新加坡国旗的货轮名为 "Dali"，长 984 英尺，宽 157 英尺。船上有 22 名船员，他们都在印度工作。以下是关于这艘撞向巴尔的摩大桥的巨轮的信息：
item.description:
The Singapore-flagged cargo ship, Dali, spans a length of 984 feet and a width of 157 feet, a listing showed. It holds 22 crew members, all of whom are based in India.

Here's what to know about the massive ship that crashed into the Baltimore bridge: https://t.co/DMT3H3bsen

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 一段视频显示了巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥在周二早些时候被一艘货轮撞击后倒入巴尔的摩港帕塔普斯科河的瞬间。
item.description:
A video shows the moment Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge collapsed into the Patapsco River in the Port of Baltimore after it was struck by a cargo ship early Tuesday. https://t.co/ygt3WsWPM8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 官员说，一艘驶离巴尔的摩港的大型货轮撞上了弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥 1.6 英里长的一根支撑柱，造成部分坍塌，车辆和人员被卷入水中。@Flipboard ➡️ 上有完整报道。
item.description:
A massive cargo ship leaving the Baltimore harbor crashed into a support column of the 1.6-mile long Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing a partial collapse and sending vehicles and people into the water, officials said.

Complete coverage on @Flipboard ➡️https://t.co/5Y681TPHsq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在纽约的封口费刑事案件的法官批准了曼哈顿地区检察官的请求，对这位前总统下达了有限的封口令。
item.description:
BREAKING: The judge in Donald Trump's criminal hush money case in New York has granted the Manhattan district attorney's request for a limited gag order on the former president. https://t.co/JT45M0yNi1 pic.twitter.com/hLJyLp6j8F

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 爆料：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在纽约的封口费刑事案件的法官批准了曼哈顿地区检察官的请求，即发布一项有限的禁言令，限制这位前总统公开发表有关证人和其他人的言论。
item.description:
BREAKING: The judge in Donald Trump's criminal hush money case in New York has granted the Manhattan district attorney's request for a limited gag order restricting the former president's public statements about witnesses and others. https://t.co/1pMwEcYsNw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯法院周二将《华尔街日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）的审前拘留期至少延长至 6 月 30 日。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周二上午，国会大厦警方逮捕了 13 名抗议者，他们正在示威抗议最高法院审查对堕胎药米非司酮的限制。
item.description:
Capitol Police on Tuesday morning arrested 13 protesters who were demonstrating against the Supreme Court's examination of restrictions to the abortion pill mifepristone. https://t.co/IiHIpTlYJv pic.twitter.com/RI2cvbR7VL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 请看视频显示了一艘巨型货轮撞上弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥的瞬间，造成巴尔的摩港几乎完全坍塌。
item.description:
SEE IT: Dramatic video shows the moment a massive cargo ship crashed into the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing a near-total collapse into the Baltimore harbor.

The crash appeared to be accidental, not intentional, officials said. https://t.co/7RAi4TeZQQ pic.twitter.com/mR7Zew5Rvs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 卡桑德拉-"卡西"-文图拉（Cassandra "Cassie" Ventura）的前搭档肖恩-"迪迪"-康姆斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）在洛杉矶和迈阿密的住所于周一遭到联邦特工突袭的消息传出后，她发表了自己的看法。
item.description:
Cassandra "Cassie" Ventura is speaking out following news that her former partner Sean "Diddy" Combs' Los Angeles and Miami homes were raided by federal agents on Monday. https://t.co/5S79hYfrjs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统就巴尔的摩大桥垮塌事件发表讲话，他对居民说："只要需要，我们就会与你们在一起。
item.description:
Pres. Biden gave remarks on the Baltimore bridge collapse, telling residents "we're going to stay with you as long as it takes."

Biden, who noted he's been over the bridge many times, said he plans to visit Baltimore as soon as possible. https://t.co/7UV4FBJHaT pic.twitter.com/g52jEQjEZc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）说，在一艘巨型货轮撞上支撑柱之前，官员们阻止了巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥上的车流，帮助挽救了灾难中的生命。
item.description:
Officials were able to stop the flow of traffic onto the Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore before a massive cargo ship crashed into a support column, helping to save lives in the disaster, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore said. https://t.co/pqiyX0oxOs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统说："这无疑拯救了生命"。
item.description:
LATEST: Personnel on the ship alerted the Maryland Department of Transportation that they lost control of the vessel, and local authorities were able to close the bridge before it was struck, "which undoubtedly saved lives," Pres. Biden said.https://t.co/jHtm617UkH pic.twitter.com/nYPdJCWBPt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 据研究人员称，全球气温上升可能会改变世界上大部分葡萄酒的生产地，因为中纬度地区可能无法再种植葡萄。
item.description:
Rising global temperatures could change where the majority of the world's wine is produced as mid-latitude regions may no longer be able to grow grapes, according to researchers. https://t.co/ioIn3t2gkr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：国土安全调查局的联邦探员在法庭授权搜查肖恩-"迪迪"-康姆斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）的两处房产时，查获了大量电子设备，执法人员告诉 @ABC 新闻。
item.description:
BREAKING: Federal agents with Homeland Security Investigations seized a number of electronic devices as part of the court-authorized searches of Sean "Diddy" Combs' two properties, law enforcement sources told @ABC News. https://t.co/zae2mCYKnM pic.twitter.com/dzJlX5sTUG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024
